sentences.en: A monkey is very alert in its movements.
sentences.cn: 猴子的动作很敏捷.

sentences.en: Do they have any monkey tricks?
sentences.cn: 他们有猴子耍把戏吗？

sentences.en: Do you like that monkey?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢那个猴子吗?。

sentences.en: he doesn't give a monkey's what we think about him.
sentences.cn: 他毫不在乎我们对他的看法。

sentences.en: He made a monkey of me on the tennis court.
sentences.cn: 他在网球场上使我大出洋相.

sentences.en: He was afraid his past would always be a monkey on his back.
sentences.cn: 他怕他过去的问题将会永远成为他的包袱.

sentences.en: He was the cat they captured to frighten the monkey.
sentences.cn: 他们抓住他是为了吓唬别人.

sentences.en: Man and the monkey have many things in common.
sentences.cn: 人和猿有许多共同之处.

sentences.en: Stop that, you little monkey!
sentences.cn: 别这样，你这个小淘气鬼！

sentences.en: The monkey engulfed the food whole.
sentences.cn: 这只猴子囫囵吞下食物。

sentences.en: The monkey had deflowered an entire section of the garden.
sentences.cn: 这只猴子把花园中一整块地方的花都糟蹋了。

sentences.en: The monkey is beating up and down.
sentences.cn: 那只猴子到处乱窜。

sentences.en: The monkey is hopping on the trees.
sentences.cn: 这只猴子在树上跳着.

sentences.en: The monkey leaps from branch to branch.
sentences.cn: 那猴子在树枝间跳来跳去.

sentences.en: The monkey made a long arm for the peach.
sentences.cn: 猴子伸臂去摘桃子.

sentences.en: The monkey made some antics.
sentences.cn: 这猴子做出几种滑稽动作.

sentences.en: The monkey performed several tricks.
sentences.cn: 猴子耍了几招把戏.

sentences.en: The monkey was swinging in the tree.
sentences.cn: 猴子在树上荡来荡去.

sentences.en: The monkey was up the tree, flinging nuts to the ground.
sentences.cn: 这只猴子爬到树上往地面扔坚果.

sentences.en: the monkey's prehensile tail
sentences.cn: 猴子能缠住东西的尾巴

sentences.en: The woolly spider monkey is the largest primate in the Americas.
sentences.cn: 绒毛蛛猴是美洲最大的灵长类动物。

sentences.en: There's been some monkey business going on here!
sentences.cn: 有人在这里搞鬼!

sentences.en: Which monkey do you like?
sentences.cn: 你喜欢哪一只猴子？

words.tran_cn: 学...的样子,仿效,滑稽模仿

phrases.phrase: as artful (或 clever) as a wagonload (或 cartload) o
phrases.tran_cn: (英，非正式)十分机灵的；十分淘气的

phrases.phrase: make a monkey of (或 out of) someone

phrases.tran_cn: （美）供儿童攀爬游戏的猴架；（英）健身房的攀架
胡闹，骗人的把戏；欺骗；恶作剧
标准罗经平台；罗经甲板
猴子把戏；耍猴戏；[口]恶作剧
(非正式)全不在乎，完全无所谓

trans.tran_en: a small brown animal with a long tail, which uses its hands to climb trees and lives in hot countries
a small brown animal with a long tail, which uses its hands to climb trees and lives in hot countries
